item.title: How to upload files when testing using Selenium Webdriver
item.description: You can use the following code to set a file path to the file upload control. WebElement file = driver.findElement(By.id("control_id")); file.sendKeys("/full/path/to/file"); You need to pass full path to the sendKeys() for it to work. Otherwise sendKeys() fails silently.
